definition: to celebrate a birthday/to give a birthday party

to do/to make/to produce/to write/to compose/to act as/to engage in/to hold (a party)/to be/to become/to function (in some capacity)/to serve as/to be used for/to form (a bond or relationship)/to pretend/to feign/to act a part/to put on appearance
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: Jo-Jo and Poppy and Ted and Ziggy and Wantab played party game.
sentences.chinese: 裘裘，波比，泰德和萬卡恩一起做生日遊戲。

definition: to celebrate a birthday (of an elderly person)
gift given to sb when meeting them for the first time
to deliver/to carry/to give (as a present)/to present (with)/to see off/to send
to give away/to accompany/to see sb off
to send/to give as a present
to offer birthday congratulations (to an elderly person)
